metadata.title: CVE-2017-3164 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Server Side Request Forgery in Apache Solr, versions 1.3 until 7.6(inclusive). Since the "shards" parameter does not have a correspondingwhitelist mechanism, a remote attacker with access to the server could makeSolr perform an HTTP GET request to any reachable URL.

criterions.comment: lucene-solr package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
